snippet: For as much as $20,000, Worldwide Motion Picture Group compares the story structure and genre of a script with those of released movies, looking for clues to box-office success.
abstract: Same kind of numbers analysis that has reshaped politics and online marketing is increasingly being used by entertainment industry, and the company Worldwide Motion Picture Group now offers script evaluation; company compares scripts with database of focus group results for similar films and surveys 1,500 potential moviegoers about what should be changed about film.
lead_paragraph: For as much as $20,000, Worldwide Motion Picture Group compares the story structure and genre of a script with those of released movies, looking for clues to box-office success.

headline.main: Solving Equation of a Hit Film Script, With Data
headline.print_headline: Solving Equation of a Hit Film Script, With Data
